column4: is there a way to run two WMs simultaneously in GNOME? i.e. on one monitor I'd love to have wmii and on another the regular metacity desktop
First off.  Gnome contains a window manager.  It's called metacity.  I don't think gnome supports two window manager at once but that is an interesting idea.
yeah. I know the default is metacity. I am able to tell gnome to use wmii as its window manager but not to have both metacity and wmii at the same time.
